markdownRemark.html:
After years (more than 15) with the debian-gnome set, I’ve decided that it was time for a change. In fact, I was waiting for a free time to change all graphic related interfaces in my dev. notebook and, by that, I mean change: window , desktop and login manager(that was GDM3).

I’ve looking for Xmonad for some time and decided to give it a try and, well, the thing is awesome! Once you’ve done with the setting up, …
